type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.maven.MavenResolver
type.description: * An {@link ArtifactRepository} which can be used to publish artifacts to Maven repositories.

method.name: beforeDeployment
method.description: * Adds a closure to be executed immediately before a deployment to this resolver. The closure is passed a {@link * org.gradle.api.artifacts.maven.MavenDeployment} as a parameter. The closure is executed after all artifacts have * been build, including generation of the POM. The closure can modify the set of artifacts to be deployed. * * @param action The closure to execute.

method.name: beforeDeployment
method.description: * Adds an action to be executed immediately before a deployment to this resolver. The action is executed after all * artifacts have been build, including generation of the POM. The action can modify the set of artifacts to be * deployed. * * @param action The action to execute.

method.name: getSettings
method.description: * Returns a Maven settings object. This can be used for example to figure out where the local repository is * located. This property is populated on demand.

property.name: settings
property.description: * Returns a Maven settings object. This can be used for example to figure out where the local repository is * located. This property is populated on demand.
